reviews.review: not bad, but not great either.
I expected awesome and it was better than awesome!

GOODBYE DC, HELLO MARVEL!
First time I checked Avengers: Infinity War out at the cinema, I found it kind of confusing and was a little disappointed with the ending.
I thought it wouldn't be something worth watching again, until I thought it would be better seeing it again if I'm sitting at a good spot understanding the story a bit more with a friend of mine who is an Avengers fan.
The second time I saw it, I actually really liked it, despite the ending that could give Avengers fans chills. I like the humour, the story, and the characters (even if I don't know a lot of the Marvel characters very well) - and I find it very amusing when the Guardians of the Galaxy meet The Avengers.
Looking forward to Part 2 when it comes out.
I was going through a terrible  thrill andgoosebumps all over ...i must say,i am the lucky one to enjoy these awesome  thrills for these  10 years.

Definitely a must see “event” for sure. Hard to stand up to all the hype and for the most part it was close. The best parts were the characters interacting, I would have approved less fight scenes and more interaction. Solid Villain. CGI was not over the top. The ending...oh the ending.

They tried too hard to make too many characters relevant.  Disappointing story line + disappointing ending makes for an overall disappointing movie.  Most other Marvel movies are better.  Especially Avengers 1&2, Captain America 2&3, and Iron Man 1&2

This is not a movie, it's an event .. An epic event !!! Beyond epicness!! loved every bit of it ...SPOILER ALERTTT!!!!  loved the ending where he wins and settle down with a beautiful sunrise and a smile on his face while everything on the universe is on chaos.

If you want over 2 hours of non stop action, amazing fight sequences, hilarious one liners and fun. This is the movie! From the opening sequence to the last minute of the movie I was on the edge of my seat. Guardians were just unbelievable! A fun fun movie I will see again and can not wait for the next Avengers! There has to be. Go see!!
This movie was excellent and did a great job of getting everyone talking and insanely hyped for next years sequel
